laboratory_examinations.findings: Not detected in sequential respiratory and stool samples
Low IgG titer; IgM and IgA negative
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Weakly positive in a competition test one week later; IgG, IgM, and IgA remained negative

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: T. gondii-specific PCR from Neonatal EDTA Blood

laboratory_examinations.findings: Primary infection during pregnancy; positive Toxoplasma-specific IgM, low IgG avidity (index 0.036)
All Toxoplasma-specific antibody classes positive; significant increase of IgG titers (1:128 to 1:2048)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Immunoblots for IgA and IgM negative; IgA confirmed positive by ISAGA

laboratory_examinations.findings: Slightly descending IgG titers; absence of IgA
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Thirteen weeks after stopping sulfadiazine treatment, increase in IgG titers (1:1024 to 1:8192) and occurrence of IgA
